title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the RealTimeBiddingPlatform, taking into account scalability, reliability, and sub-10ms latency requirements.

title: Design Real-Time Data Processing System
description: Develop a design for handling and processing millions of bid requests per second in real-time.

title: Create Frontend Interface Design
description: Design the user interface for the RealTimeBiddingPlatform, considering ease of use and efficient communication between advertisers and publishers.

title: Develop Bidder Implementations
description: Create multiple bidder implementations for different ad servers and exchanges.

title: Establish Database Design and Schema
description: Design the database schema for storing bid requests, winning bids, and related data.

title: Set Up DevOps and Continuous Integration/Deployment
description: Configure development environment, tools, and pipelines for the RealTimeBiddingPlatform.

title: Perform Security Audit and Vulnerability Testing
description: Conduct security audit and vulnerability testing on the RealTimeBiddingPlatform to ensure data protection and compliance.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the design and functionality of the RealTimeBiddingPlatform for developers, testers, and users.
